title: FPS Question
body: Is uncapping my FPS bad for my computer? it can usually run from 200 - 300 FPS but is it better to capp it at 144? or is uncapping bad?

replies.body: It depends on the specs/hardware of your PC as well as personal preference.  For example, some PCs are actually SO good that they have [High-end FPS issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs)and need to have their FPS capped.  I hope that helps clear things up!
